attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the host instance.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the host instance.

attributes.name: operationalStatus
attributes.description: Operational statuses for the host.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the host, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description:
Host name:
  • For an automatically-managed ESX server through vCenter, this is the display name in the vCenter GUI.
  • For a manually-created host, this is the host name entered by the user.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Host description.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type of host configuration.

attributes.name: osType
attributes.description: Operating system running on the host.

attributes.name: hostUUID
attributes.description: (Applies to VCenter server and ESX host configurations only.) Universal Unique Identifier (UUID) of the host.

attributes.name: hostPushedUUID
attributes.description: (Applies to VCenter server and ESX host configurations only.) Pushed UUID of the host.

attributes.name: hostPolledUUID
attributes.description: (Applies to VCenter server and ESX host configurations only.) Polled UUID of the host.

attributes.name: isInitializationComplete
attributes.description: Through indication only to tell clients to validate vm cache

attributes.name: lastPollTime
attributes.description: (Applies to hosts on ESX servers only.) Indicates the date and time when the storage array received the host configuration data from the ESX server.

attributes.name: autoManageType
attributes.description: Indicates how the host is managed.

attributes.name: registrationType
attributes.description: Indicates how initiators are registered to the host.

attributes.name: hostContainer
attributes.description: (Applies to VCenter server and ESX host configurations only.) Identifier of the parent host container, as defined by the hostContainer resource type.

attributes.name: fcHostInitiators
attributes.description: Identifiers of the Fibre Channel initiators associated with the host, as defined by the hostInitiator resource type.

attributes.name: iscsiHostInitiators
attributes.description: Identifiers of the iSCSI initiators associated with the host, as defined by the hostInitiator resource type.

attributes.name: hostIPPorts
attributes.description: Identifiers of the network ports associated with the host, as defined by the hostIPPort resource type.

attributes.name: storageResources
attributes.description: Identifiers of the storage resources used by the host, as defined by the storageResource resource type.

attributes.name: hostLUNs
attributes.description: (Applies to iSCSI and Fibre Channel host configurations only.) Identifiers of the LUNs accessible by the host, as defined by the hostLUN resource type.

attributes.name: datastores
attributes.description: The datastores associated with the current host

attributes.name: nfsShareAccesses
attributes.description: The hostShares associated with the current host

attributes.name: hostVVolDatastore
attributes.description: The hostVVolDatastores associated with the current host

attributes.name: vms
attributes.description: The vms associated with the current host
